nodes.text: Beti was a doll owned by Sylvestri Yarrow during her childhood. When her mother Chancey later gifted her a blaster rifle, Sylvestri named it "Beti" after the doll.
Beti was first mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Out of the Shadows. The doll's name was spelled "Betty" in a preview of the novel published in The High Republic: Into the Dark.
